original_text: And when the days of his mourning were past, Joseph spake unto the house of Pharaoh, saying, If now I have found grace in your eyes, speak, I pray you, in the ears of Pharaoh, saying,
korean_text: 곡하는 기한이 지나매 요셉이 바로의 궁에 말하여 이르되 내가 너희에게 은혜를 입었으면 원하건대 바로의 귀에 아뢰기를

sentences.original_text: And when the days of his mourning were past,
Joseph spake unto the house of Pharaoh, saying,
If now I have found grace in your eyes,
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 내가 이제 당신들 눈에 은혜를 입었다면

sentences.original_text: speak, I pray you, in the ears of Pharaoh, saying,
